==Chinese==

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} – the sun ({{zh-l|*日}}) sinking into the [[bushes]] ({{zh-l|*屮}}); dusk. Original form of {{och-l|暮|dusk}}.

The bottom was later distorted into {{zh-l|*大}}.

===Etymology 1===
{{zh-forms}}
From {{och-l|無|there is no}} + distributive suffix *''-k'' ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
{{attention|zh|surname belongs in this etymology?}}
